text: Is there a good reason to use this function, or can we use np.recfromcsv, which would avoid importing from matplotlib?
title: (196, '', u'nilearn/datasets.py')

text: Yes, unfortunately. The CSV file contains a "comment" column with strings (quoted text) and these strings contain commas. Unfortunately, AFAIK, numpy is not able to read CSV with strings containing commas.
